name: Escape From Rock Candy Cavern
description:
Help Razzle, the blue raspberry gumball escape all 8 levels of Rock Candy Cavern.  Using A and D or the Left and Right Arrows, avoid all obstacles or be forced restart the level! Need a break or want to restart the game from level 1? Press escape to pause.

Can you escape??? Be sure to share your time if you do!

Stuck? Try a different path or master yours.

All feedback is welcomed!
